prod_short_desc: Add another useful piece to your LEGO® collection with this Gray Baseplate!
prod_long_desc:
Whether you’re creating a street scene, castle, or something of your own imagination, this gray-colored 48x48-stud baseplate is the perfect starting point for building, displaying, and playing with your LEGO® creations.
Measures 48x48 studs or 15'' x 15'' 
A great supplement to any LEGO® collection!
